title: Shrimp Cobb Salad
directions: Cook bacon and shrimp in two separate skillets. Season shrimp with paprika, garlic salt, and pepper.
While meat cooks, combine regular salt, lemon juice, olive oil, and mustard in salad bowl and stir with a whisk.
Add lettuce, tomatoes, and carrots to coat.
Add corn to the shrimp skillet and add seasoning if needed.
Rip up bacon to smaller pieces when done and add to salad along with shrimp/corn mixture.
